message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value and what I'm willing to accept. I could consider a price of $900,000. This offer represents a substantial discount from my initial asking price while acknowledging the product's worth.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $850,000. This price reflects my desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
